name: Microsoft Expression Web Package
summary: Learn about .FWP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can create FWP files in Expression Web 4 by choosing the Site → Export to Web Package... menu option. You can import them by selecting Import → Import from Web Package....
NOTE: Microsoft discontinued Expression Studio in 2012.

description: A file with .fwp file is an archive file created with Microsoft Expression Web and contains all the files and folders for a design. Microsoft Expression Web is a general web design software product by Microsoft and is based on HTML editor. It has been discontinued since 2012 and available free for download by Microsoft. FWP files can be exported and saved as Microsoft’s .cab format.

Archive created by Microsoft Expression Web, a website design program that is part of Expression Studio; contains all files and folders for a design and allows the design to be exported and then imported into another copy of Expression Web; saved in Microsoft's .CAB format.
